roleset.name: demonstrating against
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, protest-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls conspire-71.

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Thom Hartmann talks to Shane Brooks about his protesting the tea party convention.

example.name: both args
example.text: ... there was no question of their protesting against disparity in wages.

roleset.name: manner of speaking
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on protest-v.02. No VNcls

example.name: all args
example.text: Only later did I become aware of my grandfather's struggles, of his protesting to the Canadian Parliament, "The Province of Quebec and all of Canada were our homeland before they were yours. For as far as I know the Indians have never lost their status as a nation."
example.arg: "The Province of Quebec and all of Canada were our homeland before they were yours. For as far as I know the Indians have never lost their status as a nation."
